King Albert Park McDonald's. Picture was taken on their last operating hours before it closed down for good.

My happiest memories of McDonalds in my homeland Singapore was back when i was a little kid at the King Albert Park outlet. 😊

Both my sister and I love the McDonalds over there. It had the playground (with little pigeon-holes for shoes) for kids and the overall interior layout of the 2-storey restaurant gives us a comfortable heartwarming, friendly and 'i-wanna-come-back-here-again" kind of feeling. 

Back then, each time when our dad said that he is bringing us over there for breakfast during the weekend, we would always get all excited and happy as how little kids would be. 🙆🏻🙌🏽 😊 At the same time, the venue served as a good bonding place for our family. We enjoyed our times whenever we were there and couldn't bear to leave the place when it was time to head home, and would always look forward to the next visit. 😊😊

Recollecting on the memories of this place really brings back alot of nostalgia. Even though the place has already been demolished for residential development purpose, it has left a huge footprint inside our hearts no matter how old we have grown up to be now. To date, I have yet to come across a McDonalds in Singapore that can give me the same feeling as how it did. 💕

My most memorable moments was at the Red Pea event at East Coast Mcdonalds for kids where Ronald McDonald will make an appearance and they have dancing and coloring sessions and games with the kids and my girl would color this picture
1984 McDonald at Fullerton area after NDP. We were the school choir. All in white.

I m always thankful to Macdonalds. During school days i used to study alone at Kallang Macdonalds. I usually stay the entire day but vacant the space during lunch and dinner crowd. The managers were very nice and did not chase me away. In some instances they even keep my books for me. For this, i always patronise Macdonalds till this day. I appreciate the kindness and generousity.

2.post_text: Dear Valued Customers, we are performing scheduled system maintenance and upgrading works on our McDelivery system from 0400 hours to 0530 hours on 19 July 2017. Therefore, we are unable to accept McDelivery orders through our website, mobile app and hotline during this period. You may wish to visit our 24 hrs restaurants during this time. Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience and bear with us in the meantime.

One of my best memories is this picture of me and my cousins on a family holiday in 1999 at a McDonald's in Kota Kinabalu, Sabah. We all live in different countries around Asia and Europe, but McDonald's gives us a universal place that we can share our love for tasty burgers with fries. We have all grown up into lawyers, pilots, accountants and teachers, but this photo forever captures the innocence of our youth. Thank you McDonald's.

Yesterday went to try the Nasi 
Lemak burger, it was kind of awkward when I used the kiosk machine, I want to change to criss cut fries, but they was not an option and drinks could not be change too, and I have to take the feast. After a while I sat down and try the burger, I feel that! If we talk about the sauce, it's too sweet and bit sour. Which doesn't suit the whole burger... and the chicken it's not crispy enough like the mcspicy double. The total of the whole burger just can't win the fantastic rice burger back in 2005. But the aroma of the nasi Lemak burger eaten in your mouth is really good. Yes its smell good when u eat, the bun is insanely soft which I like, but the sauce doesn't goes well with the whole burger, I would rate the nasi Lemak burger 4/10

Maybe the items are new. So the staff yet to "catch on" the technique of preparing these items. So ended up with burnt, missing or prepared items, But should not be an excuse for not doing a proper quality control before selling them.

This is the first time i heard of Nasi Lemak burger and I think it is an innovative idea from Mcdonalds. If anyone is expecting it to have a rice-like-texture and EXACT same pack of flavor from a regular nasi lemak, don't bother trying it (duh).

Honestly, I did not expect it to turn out to be good but it was surprisingly delicious! It does resembles the taste of nasi lemak (Mainly from the coconut flavoured chicken and combination of ingredients). The sambal is decent. As a chili/spice lover, I requested for more sambal for my burger and damn it was dripping with sambal goodness! For those of you who likes spicy food, do remember to request for more sambal! It might be abit messy but it was worth it. :)

I ordered the criss cut fries along with my burger. It was salty and flavorful enough for my liking but it was cold and hard when it was served. Also, I ordered a nasi lemak burger and the lady behind me ordered 2 of it. Both of us were dining it, yet, the staff gave her the burgers first. Slightly disappointed in the service. 

Overall, kudos to McDonald's for this creation. Would I order it again? Yes.
Very suck. Night time receive the meal very messy and salty. Charge me so expensive order wrong drinks. Milo become coffee.
The rest of other burgers are good especially the MAC crispy chicken 👍👍

I think the dressing of the burger is important. I tried two different outlet. One the burger was proper dress which is good. The other one i went was disappointing. The sambal was leaking out from the burger and the bun was pressed that you can see a thumb shape on then bun.

Yackson Ng

Overall rating: 6/10 (Love it for the taste, but this is not the Nasi Lemak Burger you are looking for).

Taste factor: 8/10
Unlike the normal burgers in their menu, the one off specials from McDonald's actually taste delicious. The new Nasi Lemak Burger is no exception. From the rempah chicken fillet to the slightly spicy sambal tumis, it was a delight at every bite. And the sambal tumis actually tasted like sambal tumis albeit being sweeter and slightly less spicy.

Packaging factor: 7/10
Each burger is wrapped in a clean looking brown paper that looks a bit atas and comes in a neat box with simple (no gawding images) text. Basic KISS (keep it short and simple).

Branding factor: 3/10
This is where it goes horribly wrong. For a product that screams Nasi Lemak, I would expect it to have at least come in a rice bun.

The main ingredient of nasi Lemak is basically 3/4 nasi (rice) and 1/4 sambal (the one which differentiates a good tasting nasi Lemak and the mehhs). The rest like the chicken, egg and kuning fish are additionals that depends on each individual person.

Without the Nasi, you can't actually call it Nasi Lemak. As such, I feel that this is such a wasted opportunity by McD. It would have been better if they just called it Sambal Tumis Burger or Rempah Chicken Burger (which would have been awesome nonetheless) to begin with.

Ordered this at 1100hrs at Changi Airport T3.
My review : 
Better with sesame seed buns.
Better dine-in.
Ask for more sambal (try your luck) : )
Served with hot, juicy chicken.
Sambalicious.
The bandung have different standard across! My friend cup taste sweet but mine is bitter!! Expect better standard given the high price..

this is not so worth it for the L crisscross fries mcfizzy.. price more expensive but yet I didn't get any different with regular meal.. drink isn't upsize and said that L crisscross fries but not much different with small fries.. feel cheated

McDonald's

However it will be even interesting if you could do a actual Nasi Lemak set meal with Mc cripsy & rice set.

Not sure whether in the future will you have set meal with rice or not but competitors have start to introduce sets with rice. 
Max

The feast is 9.00 and includes coconut pie,  small cross fries 

However, the meal with upsize is 9.20 . There is no coconut pie.  Only get medium cross fries.  And to be honest,  small vs medium cross fries, there is negligible difference... 

Feel that the pricing of the meal and 1.40 add on structure can be reconsidered. 

Thank you

okay i tried!

Nasi Lemak Burger: Yupp Nice, n its huge! those who cant eat much sure wont finish this, its more to sweet side than spicy, if u dont like cucumber pls do remove it, mine got 2 slices, the chicken is nice like ayam goreng, it got the santan/coconut milk taste, can really taste the spices in it, the sambal is nice too, not hot, egg is egg, distracting part is alot of onions Lol
7.5/10

Coconut Pie: better than i expected, light n not too sweet, sedap! 
9/10

Bandung McFizz: Translation is Soda Gembira, but it lack of milk n rose syrup, still nice tho i like it!
7/10

Chendol Mcflurry: Mine lack of gula melaka maybe too high demand, with coconut 'strip' inside n needs more of the green stuff, also nice! jst that it melts fast!
8.5/10

Crisscross Fries: is kantang. 

 Kbye!

Nasi Lemak burger does taste a bit like Nasi Lemak and the sambal is nice. Being old school i still prefer the original Nasi Lemak but of course this is a must try. The Bandung drink taste like 7 Up. Nothing really special about it. Just like another fizzy drink. Mcflurry Cendol more to the taste of Vanilla then Cendol. Coconut pie? Would prefer if they use original coconut rather then Nata De Coco. I rank Coconut Pie last in the Mcdonald Pie's family. Overall i gave Nasi Lemak Burger 8/10, Bandung Drink 6/10, Mcflurry Cendol 4/10 and Coconut Pie 4/10.

The best Chendol McFlurry I tried, the stall outside Lucky Plaza.  The rest all simply tasted coconut cream.

Kacang might be dangerous in a burger, might launch straight to your throat, choking hazard. I might be wrong, to check and consider.

14.post_text: Dear Valued Customers, we are performing scheduled system maintenance and upgrading works on our McDelivery system from 0330 hours to 0530 hours on 04 July 2017. Therefore, we are unable to accept McDelivery orders through our website, mobile app and hotline during this period. You may wish to visit our 24 hrs restaurants during this time. Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience and bear with us in the meantime.

comments.message: You know what's bright yellow? The egg in your mcgriddles.

I just ordered at mcdelivery and the food should come 3.15am but until 3.30am nobody came, no call to me also. At last 3.40am Jennifer from bedok reservoir branch called and said the rider reach my doorstep so he called me 3 times and i didnt pickup so the rider went back. This Jennifer keep repeating the rider did call me and she saw the rider's hp. But my side of story is, my husband open our door big waiting for the delivery and we have a camera outside our corridoor. I can even get my call log from singtel! THIS IS BULLSHIT! You are wasting our time to wait for 2nd delivery!! And your rider is lying!! Even the Jennifer that called us also accusing me for not picking up the rider's call! I AM TAKING THIS SERIOUSLY! THIS IS NOT ABOUT MONEY! We are hungry so we ordered mac delivery and this is the service and treatment we got it!!! I want a apologize from you!

Kepala banana lah..!!! Bring back vanilla ice cream. Atleast let us choose instead of everything bloody banana flavour.. And we dont bloody care about what colour your bloody CONEks.. ALL WE CARE IS VANILLA ICE CREAM!!! Nabeiii...

Went to Mc Donald's at Tampines West Community Center yesterday and they ran out of stock for blue cones. Saying  that they will discontinue the ice cream station momentarily.

So I waited awhile instead, hoping they'll restock. After waiting 10 minutes. They finally got the station back up. But i got a normal cone instead. I was still happy as it was a once in a lifetime delicacy.

I thank McDonalds for their swift recovery. 👏👏👏

comments.message:
5-10 years ago, mac bfast was heaven. It was perfect. Jump to now, where should I start? 

-Eggs tastes very processed and ugh. 
-Patty is flat and tastes processed too. 
-Buns used to be so puffy but now its like roti prata. 
-Hotcakes used to be bigger and fatter. Now its miserably thin and small. Tasteless too. 
-The bacon. Is it even. Very rubbery, plastic-ky. 

Idk that's all I've tried so far and I'm not willing to try anymore and be disappointed at how much your quality of food has dropped. 

Rip.

McDonald's isit possible you guys increase the amount of curry sauce we can take for purchasing a set meal? Charging 0.30 more for an additional  one is just stupid. Why not change the limit to 2 or smth so each individual can satisfy their tastebuds?

I had wonderful experience this evening, 22 June 2017, with McDelivery. I placed my order at 1849hrs for 2 happy meals (8 pieces of nuggets, 2 small fries & 2 packet of Ribena), a Mc chicken meal (burger plain, medium fries & medium sprites w/o ice), 1 banana pie & 6 pieces of minions potatoes, estimated arrival time is 2125hrs.  Our economy is picking up, Mc Donald business is SOOO GOOD that they need to take 156 mins to prepare 3 sets of meals, 1 banana pie & 6 minions potatoes.  Has Hari Raya been brought forward???? Or today is weekend????  Thank you so much to e customer service officer, Nur Diya Nah, she was so helpful in executing my slimming program.

20.post_text: Missed your chance to have your picture taken with Gru and the Minions? Well, fret not! They’ll be coming down to McDonald’s for one last time this weekend. Remember to keep your calendars free!

comments.message:
Hi, I'll like to raise a small issue over my drive thru purchase at Mcd (west coast park outlet). I've ordered a fillet o fish meal and an a la carte mc chicken. The mc chicken was ok, whatever needs to be there is there (i.e all chicken patty, crunchy fresh lettuce, smooth mayonnaise sauce and on a sesame seed bun). I happily enjoyed my mc chicken while waiting for my wife to knock off from work. Not long after, my wife hop onto my car and I handed over the box of fillet o fish. Even before she open the box, she knew that something is amiss. It was too light. She thought that I'm too hungry and ate half of the burger. Hahaha... she open up the box immediately and saw no fish fillet in between the buns. Just tartar sauce and cheese. I guessed your staffs must have missed out the fillet. :( 

End up my wife still thinking whether to put chili on the fillet-no-fish. We both have a good laugh over this.. 

#filletnofish #pleasedontfaultyourstaffs #justasmallmatter
Your banana ice cream is terrible, give us back our vanilla cones!

At 21June 11pm I called McDelivery at stagmont camp and was told it will be coming within 30min to 1hour. Instead I waited 2hours for my mac and when my meals arrive the food are cold and the fries are soggy. Can you please do something for my dissatisfaction for the incident? Thanks. I don't have the invoice and receipt for me too.
